channel.title: Node.js on Çağatay Türkan
channel.description: Recent content in Node.js on Çağatay Türkan

item.title: Build a RESTful API with Fastify and Node.js
item.description: Fastify is a modern web framework for Node.js that focuses on providing high performance with low overhead. In this article, I will explain in detail what Fastify is, how it’s used, and best practice recommendations.
